name: MyAffirmations
0:
”Alexa ask My Affirmations for my morning affirmations”
”Alexa open My Affirmations and ask for my morning affirmations”
”Alexa ask My Affirmations for the evening affirmations”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my affirmations
des:
My Affirmations is a skill developed with the go-getter in mind.

These Affirmations are in the Longer Format you would find in a more professional offering. Each Affirmation ends with a nice Tibetan Bowl, so you know it's over.

If you are the type of person who likes to develop better habits for your life, and stick with these habits, this Skill is for you.

My affirmations was created for the on the go entrepreneur, a young and upcoming professional, and more generally for people who don't settle.

This skill is definitely for you if you walk down the path of high resistance, if you, like many of us, have confidence and certainty that you can achieve greater states of happiness in your life through routine, systems, and hard work.

My Affirmations can be played in the morning and in the evening.

Just say, "Alexa, open My Affirmations and ask what are the morning affirmations," every morning for a consistent reminder of your inner ambitions and larger goals for life.

Or, if you need a quick, refresher, try saying, "Alexa, ask My Affirmations what are the morning affirmations."

Feel the positive emotions associated with that affirmation run through your body again and again. 

Stack those rocks and program your mind the way you want it to be programmed.

When the day is done, and you are all ready to sleep, invite Alexa to walk alongside you in your journey to achieve success.

Just say, "Alexa, open My Affirmations and ask what are the Evening affirmations."

You no longer have to fuss with your cell phone to try to and find an MP3 file you recorded of yourself.

With Alexa, staying on top of your affirmation habit in your life is easier than it has ever been.

We always welcome feedback.

Thanks for trying out My Affirmations.

Thank You
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
